validators.description: High performance validator committed to the Solana ecosystem.
We use high-performance infrastructure and share MEV for you to earn ultra optimized rewards.

I am an individual validator from Ukraine, I have extensive experience in Devops, I work in one of the largest banks in the country. The path to solana validators was long and difficult :). I was able to find a private data center, so I have good decentralization

Juicy Stake was founded by Knox Trades, a Systems, Networking, and Cloud Architect but even moreso, a blockchain maxi. The goal for Juicy Stake is to provide validator staking and services to consumers who want to stake their crypto on Proof of Stake Blockchains.
We are a professional high-performance validator running on decentralized enterprise hardware. Available to answer any questions you have. Join our Discord at https://discord.gg/3JXdTavv6x.

Avaulto is a blockchain company that specializes in Proof of Stake technology. Its primary objective is to provide superior-quality nodes that support staking mechanisms for multiple blockchains. The company was established in 2020 with a strong emphasis on the following priority goals: ensuring node security, offering top-tier monitoring and alerting tools, exhibiting an unwavering commitment to the delegator and broader community, and maximizing uptime to achieve maximum gains.

We use significant software and hardware optimizations to provide the best APY on Solana. If you would like to learn more about staking, validators and/or Solana please visit us on our discord at (discord.gg/cogent) or visit us at https://cogentcrypto.io/ where we publish guides and tools.
Active member of Solana community and experienced IT engineer.
